TokenNoteHoverEnabled.Name: Token Note Hover Enabled
TokenNoteHoverEnabled.Hint: Show the token note on hover.

TokenNoteHoverDarkMode.Name: Token Note Dark Mode
TokenNoteHoverDarkMode.Hint: Show note with light text on a dark background.

TokenNoteHoverFontSize.Name: Token Note Text Size Override
TokenNoteHoverFontSize.Hint: Override the base text size for the token entry display. Example: 1.5rem.

TokenNoteHoverMaxWidth.Name: Token Note Maximum Width
TokenNoteHoverMaxWidth.Hint: The maximum width in px the entry display can grow to before it will force wrapping.
